title: Neon Rain
synopsis: A young detective, lost in the labyrinthine corridors of a futuristic airport, catches a glimpse of a mysterious woman who seems to know more than she lets on.  Their brief encounter leaves him questioning everything he thought he knew.

shots.title: Arrival
shots.visual_description: EXT. FUTURISTIC AIRPORT - NIGHT. Rain lashes down on a sleek, glass-and-steel airport terminal, bathed in a 50% grey, 30% blue, 20% neon light palette.  Low-angle shot, iPhone-style shaky camera, focusing on a young, trench-coated DETECTIVE (20s) emerging from a taxi, his face partially obscured by the rain and a low-hanging neon sign.  The camera pans up to reveal the immense scale of the airport.  Water streaks down the lens.

A young detective, trench coat slick with rain, exits a taxi at a futuristic airport at night. A low-hanging neon sign partially obscures the detective's face, adding to the noir atmosphere.  The detective's expression is unseen, shrouded in shadow and rain.  The camera pans up slowly, revealing the immense scale of the airport, its towering architecture dwarfed only by the stormy sky. shots.title: Lost in the Maze
shots.visual_description: INT. AIRPORT TERMINAL - NIGHT.  The Detective navigates the crowded, futuristic terminal, filmed with a handheld iPhone camera, creating a sense of disorientation and claustrophobia.  Fluorescent lights flicker, casting harsh shadows.  He glances nervously over his shoulder, his reflection briefly visible in a polished metal surface.  Color palette remains consistent, with emphasis on blue and grey tones.
shots.prompt: Handheld iPhone-style shot, mimicking shaky cam, following a young, weary detective through a crowded, futuristic airport terminal at night.  Fluorescent lights flicker intermittently, casting harsh blue and grey shadows across the polished metal and glass surfaces.  The color palette is predominantly grey (50%), cool blue (30%), punctuated by neon accents (20%).  The detective, his face partially obscured by shadow, nervously glances over his shoulder, his reflection briefly caught in a metallic surface.  A mysterious woman, partially visible in the background, blends into the crowd.  Low-angle shots emphasize the claustrophobia of the terminal.  Rain streaks the large panoramic windows, blurring the outside world.  The camera remains close to the detective, conveying his disorientation and paranoia.  Sound design should incorporate the low hum of the terminal, the rhythmic drip of rain, and the muffled chatter of the crowd.

shots.title: First Glimpse
shots.visual_description: INT. AIRPORT LOUNGE - NIGHT.  The Detective pauses, watching a MYSTERIOUS WOMAN (30s) through a rain-streaked window. She's elegantly dressed in a dark, flowing coat, her face partially hidden by a wide-brimmed hat.  Close-up shot on the Woman's hand, delicately holding a futuristic cigarette lighter, then a slow pan up to her face, revealing only a small portion.  The neon lights reflect in her eyes.  iPhone camera's grainy quality enhances the mystery.

shots.title: The Exchange
shots.visual_description: INT. AIRPORT LOUNGE - NIGHT.  The Detective approaches the Woman cautiously.  A quick exchange of glances—she subtly slides something small into his hand, a flash of metal.  The camera focuses on his hand receiving the object, before quickly cutting away.  The lighting is dim and moody, with streaks of neon reflecting on the polished floor.  The atmosphere is tense.

shots.title: Sudden Departure
shots.visual_description: INT. AIRPORT TERMINAL - NIGHT.  The Woman melts into the crowd. The Detective watches her go, his expression unreadable.  The camera follows her through the bustling terminal, focusing on the way she moves, effortlessly disappearing amidst the throng of people.  The shot ends with her disappearing around a corner, leaving the Detective alone.
shots.prompt: Generate a cinematic, iPhone-style tracking shot, noir in mood.  Int. futuristic airport terminal, night. Rain streaks the vast windows, reflecting neon signs in a 50% grey, 30% blue, 20% neon palette.  A young woman, coat collar up, moves swiftly through a bustling crowd.  Low-key lighting emphasizes her silhouette. The camera follows her from a slightly low angle, maintaining a close but unobtrusive distance, mimicking a handheld feel. Her movements are fluid, almost ethereal, as she blends seamlessly into the throng.  In the background, a detective, his face partially obscured in shadow, watches her go, his expression impassive.  The camera tracks her as she disappears around a corner, leaving the detective alone, bathed in the cool neon glow.  Focus on her movement, emphasizing the anonymity of the crowd.  The final shot lingers on the detective’s solitude.

shots.title: Reflection
shots.visual_description: EXT. FUTURISTIC AIRPORT - NIGHT. The Detective stands alone in the rain, examining the small metal object in his hand.  It's a key card, possibly to a restricted area. A close-up on the card, then back to his contemplative face, lit by a distant neon sign.  The rain continues to fall, washing away the city lights in the background. A slow zoom out concludes the scene.
